files.patch:
@@ -35,2 +35,2 @@
-      const char* msg = "GC mode needs -XX:+" #name " to work correctly";   \
-      vm_exit_during_initialization("Error", msg);                          \
+      vm_exit_during_initialization("Error",                                \
+              "GC mode needs -XX:+" #name " to work correctly");            \
@@ -43,2 +43,2 @@
-      const char* msg = "GC mode needs -XX:-" #name " to work correctly";   \
-      vm_exit_during_initialization("Error", msg);                          \
+      vm_exit_during_initialization("Error",                                \
+              "GC mode needs -XX:-" #name " to work correctly");            \
